text: @SenSchumer When is there going to be at home tests available for COVID19? When can I get tested? I have 5 people I care for with 3 of them with underlying conditions. Everytime I step out the door to care for them I risk bringing the Virus home? When are we getting tests. #PAtesting

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
